xwikidoc.name: PDFExportTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: PDFExportTranslations
xwikidoc.content: pdfexport.export.title={0}: Export multiple pages pdfexport.help=Check the boxes to select the pages to put in the exported PDF.\n\n Note: you can move the pages in this interface to change the order of the pages exported in the PDF, the modifications on the hierarchy will not be preserved. pdfexport.filename=Name of the exported file: pdfexport.doexport=Export pdfexport.multipages=Every document starts on a new page pdfexport.startonrecto=Every document starts on 'recto' (only if the "new page" checkbox is checked) pdfexport.pdfcover=Print a cover page (containing the pdf title and the export date) pdfexport.pdftoc=Print a table of contents
